title: Queentoshi
author: Queentoshi
content: Hello everyone, I'm new here but not to crypto, and I must say that I'm totally excited to find a forum dedicated to bitcoin and crypto generally.  Before signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them. So far in my very short time here, I have opened a lot of pages here and as far as I can see, this website is unlike any I have come across having bitcoin or crypto in their names. I hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMreason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them.There's a significant difference — Bitcointalk doesn't sell you anything. It's just an online forum where people talk about bitcoin/cryptocurrencies.Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMI hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?What do you want to know? And what are your goals that you want to achieve in the first place?Also, you might want to look at the forum rules: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0

comments.author: Cookdata
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMI hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?Welcome to Bitcointalk Queentoshi!The knowledge here is broad, you will like this forum as you continue your journey here and will learn something new every day.Take your time and go through Newbies - Read before posting, Please avoid plagiarism, if you are good at your local, visit the local boards we have in the forum to locate your local board, it helps you communicate fluently with your language pals.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PM So far in my very short time here, I have opened a lot of pages here That would set you apart from about 90%+ of the users who sign up here, but do not bother to read about the forum they are on.There are thousands of helpful threads around the forum which would help you grow in Bitcoin and also acquaint you with how the forum works, the rules posted above is one of them. Also be on the lookout for stickies; they are threads pinned to the top of different boards and give basic information about those boards or general Bitcoin knowledge.Welcome to the forum and good luck, make what you want of it.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on May 10, 2022, 05:15:40 PMQuote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMreason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them.There's a significant difference — Bitcointalk doesn't sell you anything. It's just an online forum where people talk about bitcoin/cryptocurrencies.that's true, but I suggest to OP to still be cautious since the forum is riddled with scammers. don't be afraid to ask if you have questions regarding a certain project, about the credibility of a user you want to transact with, etc... also, just to add to what mk4 shared, I suggest reading this thread too "Newbies - Read before posting" it is a very useful thread for users that are new to the forumWelcome to the forum!

comments.author: Bhig Daddy
comments.body: You welcome, in bitcointalk we don't sell anything, this is just a forum where alot of people who are willing to know more about crypto and also advises each other on bitcoin. This is a very unique forum, you will enjoy your stay here, just read alot and u will see.

comments.author: Bamjos
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMHello everyone, I'm new here but not to crypto, and I must say that I'm totally excited to find a forum dedicated to bitcoin and crypto generally.  Before signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them. So far in my very short time here, I have opened a lot of pages here and as far as I can see, this website is unlike any I have come across having bitcoin or crypto in their names. Welcome to the forum. It's good that you've found out one of the best place to acquire knowledge, most especially about Bitcoin and Cryptocurrency in general. There are a lot of platform out there that may not be able to serve the same purpose bitcointalk in serving. You will be blessed with knowledge from others; you will also be a blessing to others by sharing your idea with them, it's good to know that you are not new to cryptocurrency as you've said, the knowledge you've gained before would help make you to be successful here in the forum.Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMI hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?If you are enthusiastic about cryptocurrency and willing to acquire knowledge, your time here will surely yield a life changing results because that's the testimony of bitcoiners that exist on this space.And concerning what you need to know, check out Newbies - Read before posting for the basic informations (about the forum) needed as a Newbie.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: I am always glad to see new members who show enthusiasm at the very beginning, and believe that the form of the forum is still a way to communicate, given all the modern ways of communication that exist today. The forum is not only a place that can provide an opportunity for communication and discussion on various topics, but also a place where you can explore history until the very beginning when Bitcoin was created.@Queentoshi, welcome to the forum and I hope you will become an active member of this community

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMHello everyone, I'm new here but not to crypto, and I must say that I'm totally excited to find a forum dedicated to bitcoin and crypto generally.  Before signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them. So far in my very short time here, I have opened a lot of pages here and as far as I can see, this website is unlike any I have come across having bitcoin or crypto in their names. I hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know? Welcome to the forum. Undoubtedly this is one of the best platforms to be and it will help you acquire most of the knowledge about Bitcoin you need to know. And I believe your time here will not be wasted as it will hopefully yield results that will help you succeed.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Welcome to this forum. I hope you enjoy your time to read all things here and learn many things. You can read on Bitcoin subforum or other subforum because that can give you more knowledge about crypto.If you want to invest in crypto, the first lesson is only invest with the money you can afford and don't break the limits if you don't have skills to analyze. Don't try to trade if you don't know how to trade.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMI hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?The first time I knew Bitcoin/crypto, just like what you are experiencing now, Crypto I know through google/internet, Forums not yet, I read and understand about Bitcoin, but not 100%, knowing the true meaning of crypto, I think it's a joke.As time went by, I found Forums and started to learn with confidence especially in the field of crypto especially Bitcoin, Gradually I understand and understand how crypto works, it's real, not a joke, I finally found out over time in fact crypto has become global.@Queentoshi, I'm sure you will find a new life in this forum, if you are diligent and sure to learn and obey some of the rules in this forum over time.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: What's wrong with someone giving advice to another person in this forum?. Did you make a research why this forum is created and what is the purpose of Bitcointalk forum?. If not then Bitcointalk forum is a place or community where people around the world who knows Bitcointalk forum is sharing new ideas, existing ideas in other platform, learning and helping those who are having trouble like their wallet, mining rig and other crypto related problem.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: nakamura12 on May 11, 2022, 10:31:10 PMWhat's wrong with someone giving advice to another person in this forum?If it is advice that goes in the direction of investing in this or that, then one should be careful when we present such things publicly. Some people are very vulnerable to the influence of others, and this can often lead to serious financial losses. When someone asks whether or not to invest in Bitcoin, then they should be explained the advantages, and also the disadvantages that such investment brings. Although this is a forum that discusses Bitcoin and much more, some use it as a place where they are just trying to earn something or get financial advice.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on May 12, 2022, 09:35:39 AMIf it is advice that goes in the direction of investing in this or that, then one should be careful when we present such things publicly. Some people are very vulnerable to the influence of others, and this can often lead to serious financial losses. When someone asks whether or not to invest in Bitcoin, then they should be explained the advantages, and also the disadvantages that such investment brings. Although this is a forum that discusses Bitcoin and much more, some use it as a place where they are just trying to earn something or get financial advice. I do get the point but op only thinks that this forum is all about giving advice to another person which you know it's not. I get why op think that this forum is just people who are giving advice to other people is because op didn't know Bitcointalk yet and why it is created. Maybe soon, he will know that it's not just about that but also sharing knowledge, learning about crypto related information that many wanted to learn from experts. That's why I ask, what's wrong about giving advice to another forum users.

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMHello everyone, I'm new here but not to crypto, and I must say that I'm totally excited to find a forum dedicated to bitcoin and crypto generally.  Before signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them. So far in my very short time here, I have opened a lot of pages here and as far as I can see, this website is unlike any I have come across having bitcoin or crypto in their names. I hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?Welcome, OP!I hope you have a wonderful time hanging around in here. Just don't forget to read the rules as what mk4 mentioned below you.Not much more to know, but enjoy reading around and joining discussions in here. Your username kinda reminds me of another user here named "SatoPrincess" as your username is "Queentoshi".

comments.author: Oceat
comments.body: Another member that is willing to help in the future just like, OP. Welcome to the club, first, if you want to know more about in this forum there's this sticky on each board of the forum you visit and take your time to read some of it. It's not necessary to read it all in one day but it will help you find your way where you want to be. There's a thousands of topics here that you can search in the address bar that's related to crypto.

comments.author: Israelgogo
comments.body: Been here is a great opportunity for me to learn more and have an effective conversations with different people from different part of the world ,it gives me an opportunities to learn more and contribute my own quota and opinion on things happening around and how things can be done effectively and carried out accurately.Been happy to be here is an understatement rather it a great privilege to be amongst the sounds and learned individuals from different part of the world.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMBefore signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them.This is already bitcointalk. And while the name suggests that this forum is all about Bitcoin, it actually is not. Surely you can talk about Bitcoin in all its aspects here, but you are also allowed to discuss about altcoins, gambling, economics, politics and society, and even off-topics. There is even a marketplace here and a currency exchange section.I’m a bit surprised that you’ve been in crypto for a while and you’ve already encountered a number of sites dedicated to it but it’s only now that you’ve discovered this forum. This is the oldest forum dedicated to Bitcoin, and which Satoshi Nakamoto himself/herself/themselves founded.Anyway, welcome to the forum! Explore and enjoy!

comments.author: uchegod-21
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMHello everyone, I'm new here but not to crypto, and I must say that I'm totally excited to find a forum dedicated to bitcoin and crypto generally.  Before signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them. So far in my very short time here, I have opened a lot of pages here and as far as I can see, this website is unlike any I have come across having bitcoin or crypto in their names. I hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?It is correct that no one will present or pressure you to invest with them here. This place is like the bitcoin it's and the things in here are also decentralized, such as the trust system and merit system but thr only difference is that here is a forum, the must be admins, staff and moderators to keep here going..Speaking about what you expect here. You will expect bitcoin discussions as the name implies. There are places you will discuss about the economy, politics   football and gambling, altcoins and even if you want to develop a projectYou are welcome. And how did you come up with such alias Queentoshi?

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: Queentoshi on May 10, 2022, 04:34:27 PMBefore signing up here, I was skeptical about the credibility of this website, reason being that I have come across some other websites as well that have bitcoin in their names like "bitcointalk", but all they do is advice you to invest with them.I hope my time here will yield life changing results, what do I need to know?It's a good thing your here and I must congratulate you to have found this forum and in all, I trust your in the right place although, you still have to exercise caution. Your already being careful and that's nice and I'll suggest you stay the part. There are always such individuals whose intentions are to plan misdeeds towards others and they very much gere as well as everywhere else. The difference is, they might not be so open as in other platforms following the close moderation of bitcointalk. Be open enough to seek opinion amidst doing your own research on every promising project or presented opportunity. It might save you the long run.And more importantly if you wish to stay here for a longer time, be familiar with and keep to the rules of the forum.
